article.headline: Canisius 88, Coastal Carolina 62
article.story: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) -- Pawel Malesa scores a career-high 25 points, leading Canisius to an 88-62 win over Coastal Carolina in a non-conference game Saturday. Malesa was 7-of-10 from 3-point range. Frank Turner had 17 points and 13 assists. Jovan Robinson had 14 points, and Willie Hassell added 12 points for the Golden Griffins. Canisius (1-8) 15-of-27 on 3-point attempts. Everage Richardson led Coastal Carolina (4-5) with 17 points. Mario Sisinni had 13 points, and Anthony Breeze had 12 points for the Chanticleers. Coastal Carolina was 7-of-23 on 3-pointers. Canisius, which held a 43-33 lead at halftime, led by as many as 32 points in the second half, building an 82-50 advantage with 4:57 remaining when Julius Coles hit a pair of free throws. Malesa scored 17 points in the second half for Canisius, which posted its highest scoring output of the season.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
